## insertText variable

Insert text from the provided index. Each key is entered individually to better simulate calls to handleTextInput.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
insertText: <GSchema extends import("prosemirror-model").Schema<string, string> = any>({ view, text, start: from, }: InsertTextParams<GSchema>) => void
```
